messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] correction:  Fanart --- Not sure I sent this
messages.msgSnippet: FYI... even the first link (the main page, ne?) is telling me forbidden.  I tried *all* of the links and got the same thing. phil guuchan
messages.messageBody:
FYI... even the first link (the main page, ne?) is telling me "forbidden." I tried *all* of the links and got the same thing.

phil

guuchan <jungleguuchan@...> wrote:
It looks like you might have to go through the main webpage first: http://bts.cside.ne.jp/tokgarchrgar/index02.html
Click on "works"
Click on the 3rd option on the left (which corresponds to http://bts.cside.ne.jp/tokgarchrgar/work_frm_o.html )

Then click on the last two boxes which correspond to below URLs.


http://bts.cside.ne.jp/tokgarchrgar/work/oeb/oeb_shinsengumi.html


This artist generally focuses more on the Ishin, but the above link goes to a number of oekaki works on the Shinsengumi. If you are diligent in poking around...

http://bts.cside.ne.jp/tokgarchrgar/work/oeb/oeb_others.html
You'll find some PMK renditions of Souji, Yamazaki and Sakamoto above

Very clean style. *envies*
S

red-bird.org | s-girl.deviantart.com
